name: absurdum
description: Reductio Ad Absurdum - The Ridiculous Application of Reduce
author: Evan Plaice <evanplaice@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:docs && npm run build:typings
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:bundles && npm run clean:typings
scripts.package: npx rimraf package && npm pack | tail -n 1 | xargs tar -xf
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run lint && npm run types
scripts.version: npm run build && git add dist/* && git diff --quiet && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -am 'Bump'
